July 11, 1931 D Doncaster Contest
Doncaster Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
doncaster-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Rimmer]
Corn Exchange, Doncaster March contest - 1st Hickleton, 2nd Bullcroft. Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4. 11th annual contest for Doncaster Infirmary. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 15, 2018, 9:58 p.m. Dec. 16, 2018, 12:38 p.m.
